genresAdvancedInfo.name: colorado hardcore
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Colorado hardcore is a subgenre of punk rock that originated in the 1980s in Colorado, USA. It is characterized by fast, aggressive rhythms, distorted guitar riffs, and shouted vocals. The lyrics often address political and social issues, and the music is known for its raw, unpolished sound. Colorado hardcore has influenced many other punk and hardcore bands around the world.
